How to set your unix default editor

alias, terminal, ubuntu, and unix | Feb 23, 2014

I can’t count how many times in the past I had troubles with unix complaining I don’t have a default editor.

To fix this issue is ridiculously simple:, just edit your bashrc and add this line:

export EDITOR='vim'
